word: G5516 - χξϛ - chx stigma - khee xee stig'-ma - Six hundred threescore and six

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Six hundred threescore and six

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: The 22nd, 14th and an obsolete letter (G4742 as a cross) of the Greek alphabet (intermediate between the 5th and 6th), used as numbers; denoting respectively 600, 60 and 6; 666 as a numeral: - six hundred threescore and six.
